Plot: The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.
Title: Ray
Writer: Taylor Hackford (story), James L. White (story), James L. White (screenplay)
Actors: Jamie Foxx, Kerry Washington, Regina King, Clifton Powell
tomatoConsensus: An engrossing and energetic portrait of a great musician's achievements and foibles, Ray is anchored by Jamie Foxx's stunning performance as Ray Charles.
